blog.name: mcu-incorrect-quotes
blog.title: just for fun
blog.description:
.They didn't said these things... or did they?
Just another blog of incorrect quotes for the marvel cinematic universe. 
Feel free to request or send something.

summary:
Happy: I saw the most beautiful woman outside today.
Tony: That's strange. Pepper as been in the office all day.
body:
Happy: I saw the most beautiful woman outside today.
Tony: That's strange. Pepper as been in the office all day.

dialogue.name: Happy
dialogue.label: Happy:
dialogue.phrase: I saw the most beautiful woman outside today.

dialogue.name: Tony
dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: That's strange. Pepper as been in the office all day.

title: Forests and Centaurs

title:
Show
          Chapter
        |
        Archive of Our Own
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Title: Love and Other Drugs

Chapter 4: Withdrawl’s a Hell of a Drug

Rating: Mature

Characters: Bruce Banner, Tony Stark, Samuel Sterns, Natasha Romanov, Clint Barton

Relationships: Bruce Banner/Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark (Past)

Status: 4/7

Words: 16,564

Summary:

“‘I’m weird about people touching the reactor,’ he blurted out. He chewed his lip, crossing his arms over his chest to hide the way his fingers twitched with that admission.

Bruce blinked, his body unfolding slightly. 'I don’t think that’s weird. That’s your heart, Tony. You shouldn’t let just anybody touch it.’

Tony’s brows rose at the sentiment. They rose even further when Bruce began to blush lightly after the fact.’

Sorry. That was…sorry. I’m one to talk, I guess.’ He made a vague hand gesture. 'Maybe I’m projecting, I don’t know.'”

Tony and Bruce are able to enjoy each other’s company for the first time since Bruce left New York. There’s a mysterious gamma pulse that needs tracking, and SHIELD suspects Sterns is behind it. Stuck together in the middle of nowhere, they make the best of things, indulging in each other’s poisons and exploring the chemistry between them. Things take a turn for the worse when it becomes apparent there’s something wrong with Bruce, and Tony is left wondering if he’s about to lose him before he really had him at all.

summary: Steve: [sighs dreamily] Sam: What’s got Steve so happy? Natasha: Last night Tony got so drunk he couldn’t recognize Steve. Steve...
body:
Steve: [sighs dreamily]

Sam: What’s got Steve so happy?

Natasha: Last night Tony got so drunk he couldn’t recognize Steve. Steve tried to take his shirt off to get him changed but Tony slapped his hand away and said: “Stop! I’m married!”.

blog.name: mysticfeather87
blog.title: If You Like Irondad
blog.description:
A blog mainly dedicated to Irondad, but sometime other things are posted.

Inbox is open for ask and prompts!

summary: What was Peter thinking during the time travel? He seemed a lot more quiet than I would imagine
question: What was Peter thinking during the time travel? He seemed a lot more quiet than I would imagine
answer:
Peter Parker was in shock, as one would usually be when seeing double of the same person. He definitely still cared for both, but he was just confused and nervous. He didn’t know how to handle the situation so he left it to the adults that did and only spoke when he needed too.

Though I agree, I should have made peter talk a bit more. Because I also believe Peter cracking jokes is his way of being able to cope with stressful and unnerving situations.

by camichats

The Frost Giants are willing to sign a treaty with the Asgardians, if there’s a little marriage with them to solidify it. How Tony got dragged into that when he’s just a human, he’ll never know. His husband is attractive though. So that’s a plus.

The Frost Giants are willing to sign a treaty with the Asgardians, if there’s a little marriage with them to solidify it. How Tony got dragged into that when he’s just a human, he’ll never know. His husband is attractive though. So that’s a plus.

summary: I have a serious problem where whenver I put on an outfit I then look to see which Marvel character it could be inspired by like...
body: I have a serious problem where whenver I put on an outfit I then look to see which Marvel character it could be inspired by like omg camp green top today matched with a purple hand bag yess Hulk vibes or nice blue dress matched with red lipstick Cap vibessss

summary: Same time last year we had the best "I thought you were dead but wow you're not!!!" stevetony reunion hugs courtesy of AA and...
body: Same time last year we had the best “I thought you were dead but wow you’re not!!!” stevetony reunion hugs courtesy of AA and now they’re in the same situation except the season was really bad so I stg they better fucking live up to last year’s “lift and twirl” hug or else 😊🔪
